entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
